snippet.title: Dreamsweeper - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: The floor isn’t lava, it’s Minesweeper! Here's a look at gameplay from Dreamsweeper in this trailer for the upcoming Dungeon Crawler x Minesweeper roguelike and a lo-fi musical game. Dreamsweeper will be available on PC (Steam and itch.io) in 2024, and a demo is available now on itch.io.
